services.title: Our Services
services.description: Professional laser cleaning services for all types of surfaces

metalSurfaces.title: Metal Surface Laser Cleaning
metalSurfaces.description: Fast and effective removal of rust, paint, oxides, and dirt from metal structures. Preserves the original texture of the material.

facadeRestoration.title: Building Facade Restoration
facadeRestoration.description: Cleaning facades from graffiti, dirt, mold, and old paint layers. Preserving the aesthetics and historical value of the building.

yachtCleaning.title: Yacht and Vessel Cleaning
yachtCleaning.description: Removal of algae, old coatings, and contaminants from yacht and vessel hulls. Preparation for painting or corrosion protection.

sculptureRestoration.title: Sculpture and Monument Restoration
sculptureRestoration.description: Delicate cleaning of historical monuments and sculptures from contamination, graffiti, or mold. Complete preservation of structure and texture.

equipmentPreparation.title: Equipment Cleaning and Preparation
equipmentPreparation.description: Laser removal of old coatings from vehicles, agricultural machinery, or construction equipment. Preparation for further protection or painting.

graffitiRemoval.title: Eco-friendly Graffiti Removal
graffitiRemoval.description: Safe and quick removal of graffiti from facades, windows, sculptures, or other objects. No damage to the material.

scaleRemoval.title: Scale and Oil Contamination Removal
scaleRemoval.description: Cleaning industrial pipes, tanks, and equipment from scale, oils, and other contaminants. Improving equipment efficiency.

postTreatment.title: Post-cleaning Treatment
postTreatment.description: Application of primer and paint after cleaning for long-lasting protection and aesthetic appearance.

shutterRestoration.title: Shutter Cleaning and Restoration
shutterRestoration.description: Cleaning shutters from graffiti, dirt, and old paint. Restoration of damaged surfaces and new paint application to restore aesthetics.

maintenance.title: Regular Maintenance
maintenance.description: We offer continuous cleaning and surface treatment to maintain their perfect condition.
